Package net.jcm.vsch.api.laser

Interface ILaserSyncedSource

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractDirectionalLaserLenBlockEntity, AbstractLaserCannonBlockEntity, AbstractLaserLenBlockEntity, LaserCondensingLenBlockEntity, LaserDetectProcessorBlockEntity, LaserEmitterBlockEntity, LaserExplosiveProcessorBlockEntity, LaserFlatMirrorBlockEntity, LaserReceiverBlockEntity, LaserSemiTransparentFlatMirrorBlockEntity, LaserStrengthDetectorLenBlockEntity
public interface ILaserSyncedSource

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    List<LaserContext>
    getEmittingLasers()
    getEmittingLasers returns a List that represents directly emitted lasers from this source.
    void
    onLaserFired(LaserContext laser)
    onLaserFired will be invoked by LaserUtil after a laser is fired directly or from queue.

  • Method Details

    • getEmittingLasers

      List<LaserContext> getEmittingLasers()
      getEmittingLasers returns a List that represents directly emitted lasers from this source.
      Returns:
      fired/redirected lasers from this source.

    • onLaserFired

      void onLaserFired(LaserContext laser)
      onLaserFired will be invoked by LaserUtil after a laser is fired directly or from queue. The source then can render the laser in client.
      Parameters:
      laser - The laser which just processed.
      See Also:
      • LaserUtil.queueLaser(net.jcm.vsch.api.laser.LaserContext)
      • LaserUtil.fireLaser(net.jcm.vsch.api.laser.LaserProperties, net.jcm.vsch.api.laser.LaserEmitter)
      • LaserUtil.fireRedirectedLaser(net.jcm.vsch.api.laser.LaserContext)
